title: Shibli condemns Bilawal’s call for closure of NAB
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 22 (APP):Federal Minister for Information and Broadcasting Senator Shibli Faraz on Wednesday strongly condemned Bilawal Bhutto Zardari’s call for closure of National Accountability Bureau ( NAB).
The minister said the call was meant to give them free hand to loot people.
Shibli, in a tweet, responded this to the press conference of Bilawal Bhutto Zardari.
